mapper.select: SELECT BSMNO, PASS, BNUM, TYPE, COMPANY, EMAIL, CEO, PHONE, FIELD, ADDR, REG_DATE, UP_DATE, DEL_DATE, DEL_YN FROM BIZ WHERE BSMNO = #{bsmno}
mapper.update: UPDATE BIZ SET COMPANY = #{company}, EMAIL = #{email}, CEO = #{ceo}, PHONE = #{phone}, FIELD = #{field}, ADDR = #{addr}, UP_DATE = sysdate WHERE BSMNO = #{bsmno}
UPDATE BIZ SET DEL_YN = 'Y', DEL_DATE = sysdate WHERE BSMNO = #{bsmno} AND PASS =#{pass}
